moreBlocks.articles:
• Medical Malpractice
    Our attorneys work to hold negligent medical professionals accountable for their actions. We handle a wide range of medical malpractice cases.
  • Motor Vehicle Accidents
    At Pribanic & Pribanic, we have extensive experience handling motor vehicle accident cases for clients from the Pittsburgh area, throughout western Pennsylvania and nationwide.
  • Personal Injury
    At Pribanic & Pribanic, our attorneys will help you seek full and fair compensation for the losses you have suffered.
  • Defective Products
    If you or a loved one has been injured due to a defective or dangerous product, the lawyers at Pribanic & Pribanic are here to help you explore your legal options.
  • Workers Comp
    At Pribanic & Pribanic, our lawyers are committed to standing up for the rights of injured workers. If you have been injured on the job, we can help you with all aspects of your workers' compensation claim and appeal.

description:
Your Personal Injury Advocate In Western Pennsylvania
Serving all of Allegheny County and the rest of Western Pennsylvania from our law office in Brookville, the attorneys at Pribanic & Pribanic are fully prepared to assist you and your family with recovering the damages you incurred as the result of another party's negligence or wrongdoing.
Founded in 1984, our law firm has served the residents of our region for the past 33 years. During that time, we have helped hundreds of individuals and families in their most dire times of need, securing millions of dollars in verdicts and settlements on behalf of the injured and disabled, including some of the largest ever awarded in our state.
Our Sole Focus Is On Helping You
Since we focus solely on injury-related claims, and considering our attorneys possess over 100 years of combined legal experience among them, you can rest assured your case will be in the best hands possible.
Regardless of how complex your situation, you can rely on us to advocate aggressively on your behalf to help you obtain the maximum amount possible for the damages and losses you sustained from a car accident, a defective product, an act of medical malpractice or nursing home abuse, a work-related injury, or any other type of similar claim.
Top-Rated, Award-Winning Assistance And Support
Top rated and having received numerous awards for our professionalism, ethics and exceptional legal service, the attorneys at Pribanic & Pribanic should be your first choice for your serious legal matter. To discuss your needs with no risk and no obligation, you can contact our law office or visit our website to schedule a free initial consultation. Should your injury prevent you from making it to one of our offices, we will gladly visit you either at your home or in the hospital.
